backend/**/*.{ts,js,json}: sh -c 'for f in "$@"; do (cd backend && npx prettier --write "${f#backend/}"); done' _
frontend/**/*.{ts,js,json,scss,css}: sh -c 'for f in "$@"; do (cd frontend && npx prettier --write "${f#frontend/}"); done' _
frontend/**/*.html: sh -c 'for f in "$@"; do (cd frontend && npx prettier --write --parser angular "${f#frontend/}" || true); done' _
